name: title_block
label: title_block
default: This is your default title. Please change it.

name: text_block1
label: text_block1
default: Isn't it fantastic that you can change your mind and create all these happy things? If you overwork it you become a cloud killer. There's nothing worse than a cloud killer. This is a happy place, little squirrels live here and play. That's what painting is all about. It should make you feel good when you paint. Don't kill all your dark areas - you need them to show the light.

name: text_block2
label: text_block2
default: There's nothing wrong with having a tree as a friend. Only think about one thing at a time. Don't get greedy. I started painting as a hobby when I was little. I didn't know I had any talent. I believe talent is just a pursued interest. Anybody can do what I do. Let your imagination be your guide.
